articles.title: Bruce Springsteen says Trump is ‘unfit’ and ‘incompetent’ in remarks during UK show - CNN
articles.description: Rock megastar Bruce Springsteen has made a series of critical remarks about US President Donald Trump and the policies of his administration, calling the American leader “unfit” for office.
articles.content:
Rock megastar Bruce Springsteen has made a series of critical remarks about US President Donald Trump and the policies of his administration, calling the American leader unfit for office.
